Our Team

Our Team

At Redwoods Capital, we strive to understand what investors are looking for and value most, then design and execute a tailored strategy that best align with their goals. With a combined over 80 years of experience from prominent industry leaders in legal, tax, investment, asset management and wealth management, our team of experts can walk you through every step of the real estate investment process.
